text: The Bologna massacre was the bombing of Bologna Centrale railway station in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy by Nuclei Armati Rivoluzionari.Bologna blast leaves dozens dead It happened on 2 August 1980. It killed 85 people and injured over 200 others.
